content.prompt: The global pattern of gender inequality index scores is similar to the expected pattern of countries by level of economic development, with the exception of a few countries such as

choices.label: South Africa, Australia, and New Zealand

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data to draw conclusions.
